page.title: 16Public services Barkestone
page.content: There is no gas in Barkestone or Plungar or Redmile.The nearest place that has is Bottesford which is 5 miles away.We have electricity in all our villages which is supplied by the East Midlands Electricity Board which has an office in Grantham.Electricity runs under the ground into our homes.These are the things in my home that need electricity:television telephone radio washing machine tumble dryer lights microwave ovens toaster dishwasher clock food mixer iron fan heater baby alarm.Most people use petrol for cars and motor bikes but lorries and some cars use diesel.There is a petrol storage depot at Redmile.Our school uses oil to heat it and we have an oil tank in the playground.When we need some more oil a tanker comes to school to deliver it.
